Southern Annular Mode (SAM) from the 20CRV2c
Using the definition for the AOI from paper
Daoyi Gong and Shaowu Wang
Definition of Antarctic Oscillation index
Geophysical  Research Letters, Vol.  26, No.4, 459-462, February  15, 1999
DOI: 10.1029/1999GL900003
Zonal mean SLP 40S (standardized by month) minus 65S- (standardized by month)
Using 1981-2010 for standardization period
